resources.string: A1. FoodApp is a final project built under Android Training of Internshala.

A2. It does Nothing except for listing some restaurants and their foods as provided by the API token from Internshala. To be concise, it simulates a Food Ordering App with limited functionality. Even payments are fake. Lol.
Q3. How long was the Internshala Training Period?
A3. The training period of the Android Training from Internshala was 6 weeks long. It consisted of 5 Modules with approximately 10 hours of videos.
Q4. Is this project Industry ready?

A4. Absolutely Not. DISCLAIMER: This project is made under given problem statement from Internshala. No special modifications were made in this project and this project is also a part of Miniâ€“Project of end of 4th Semester, B.Tech which is to be assessed in 5th Semester.
